mapper.select: select exam_papers.*, exam_papers_user_result.id resultId, exam_papers_user_result.set_score, exam_papers_user_result.mark from exam_papers left join exam_papers_user_result on exam_papers.id = exam_papers_user_result.papers_id where exam_papers_user_result.user_id = #{userId}

select exam_papers.*, exam_professional.id professionalId, exam_professional.professional_name professionalName, exam_course.id courseId, exam_course.course_name courseName, exam_papers_user_result.mark, exam_papers_user_result.set_score setScore, exam_papers_user_result.id papersUserResultId from exam_papers left join exam_papers_user on exam_papers.id = exam_papers_user.papers_id join exam_papers_course on exam_papers.id = exam_papers_course.papers_id join exam_professional on exam_papers_course.professional_id = exam_professional.id join exam_course on exam_papers_course.course_id = exam_course.id join exam_papers_user_result on exam_papers.id = exam_papers_user_result.papers_id where exam_papers_user.user_id = #{userId} and exam_papers.type = #{type} and exam_papers_user.is_papers = 1
